tvshows.description: A recently released ex-convict named Shadow meets a mysterious man who calls himself 'Wednesday' and who knows more than he first seems to about Shadow's life and past.
tvshows.title: American Gods

tvshows.description: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer, Jimmy McGill, in the time leading up to establishing his strip-mall law office in Albuquerque, New Mexico.
tvshows.title: Better Call Saul

tvshows.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying forces in order to get him back.
tvshows.title: Stranger Things

tvshows.description: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.
tvshows.title: House of Cards

tvshows.description: Anthology series that examines how and why ordinary people commit brutal crimes.
tvshows.title: The Sinner

movies.title: The Shining
movies.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

movies.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
movies.description: One year after Kevin was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself in New York City, and the same criminals are not far behind.

movies.title: The Revenant
movies.description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Lost in Space
movies.description: After crash-landing on an alien planet, the Robinson family fight against all odds to survive and escape, but they're surrounded by hidden dangers.

movies.title: Conan the Barbarian
movies.description: A barbarian warrior sets off to avenge his parents and his tribe whom were slain by an evil sorcerer and his henchmen when he was a boy.

movies.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
movies.description: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares for battle with the First Order.

movies.title: Annihilation
movies.description: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

movies.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
movies.description: During an adventure into the criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his future copilot Chewbacca and encounters Lando Calrissian years before joining the Rebellion.

movies.title: A Quiet Place
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

movies.title: Hereditary
movies.description: After the family matriarch passes away, a grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences, and begin to unravel dark secrets.

movies.title: Deadpool 2
movies.description: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (AKA. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg, Cable.

movies.title: IT
movies.description: It is a movie starring Bill Skarsgård, Jaeden Lieberher, and Finn Wolfhard. In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shapeshifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

movies.title: Hidden Figures
movies.description: The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.description: TT'Challa, the King of Wakanda, rises to the throne in the isolated, technologically advanced African nation, but his claim is challenged by a vengeful outsider who was a childhood victim of T'Challa's father's mistake.
